text: Johnson, a Kissi man, is our #FNBios today. Captured as a child, he lived 20 years under slavery in USA. Fled to Boston in 1830 and got his freedom. He became an important voice in the fight for abolition. All mini bios in English in our Instagram. #BlackHistory #AfricanHistory
